info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:59PM EDT until August 03 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR WASHTENAW COUNTY... At 559 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chelsea, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Dexter around 615 PM EDT. Ann Arbor around 620 PM EDT. Whitmore Lake and Dixboro around 630 PM EDT. Salem around 645 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pittsfield Township, Whittaker, Hudson Mills Metropark, Bridgewater, Delhi Mills, Pleasant Lake and Barton Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
